name: mrcidmd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)), wss(c1, c3))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0 `(c0 ` c1))=(c0 ` c1), c2 ∈(Moore ` c3), c1 ⊆ c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)), wss(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)), wss(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)), wss(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmrc, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cmre, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmrc, c2))

comment: Moore closure is idempotent. Deduction form of ~ mrcidm . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
